sourcesContent:
export const ErrorAlert = (message) =>
    toast.error(message, {
      bodyClassName: "ToastifyLoginError",
      position: "bottom-center",
      fontSize: "2px",
      autoClose: 5000,
      hideProgressBar: false,
      newestOnTop: true,
      closeOnClick: true,
      pauseOnFocusLoss: true,
      draggable: true,
      pauseOnHover: true,
      theme: "light",
      rtl: false,
    });
